'''2.2.8116''' ({{w|Microsoft Windows|Windows}}), '''2.2.8117''' ({{w|Microsoft Windows|Windows}}, via the {{w|Microsoft Store}}/{{W|Xbox (app)|Xbox app}}), '''2.2.8115''' ({{w|macOS}}), or '''2.2.8114''' ({{w|Linux}}), is an update to the [[Minecraft Launcher|launcher]] released on December 7, 2021.

== Changes ==
* Improved post-Microsoft Account migration flow.

== Fixes ==
* Now New Windows Launcher will load or save configs which used by the Standalone Launcher. ({{Bug|MCL-19986}})
* Now user will not receive an error message when clicked "Add Account" then quickly close the login window. 
* Now users new to Java will now be prompted to create a Java gamertag when they navigate to the Skins Java tab. ({{Bug|MCL-20219}})</onlyinclude>
